items.question: What makes things fall down?
hints: Think about the force that pulls everything toward Earth
Gravity is the force that makes things fall down

items.question: Which animal lives in water?
hints: Plants need multiple things to stay healthy
Plants need both sunlight and water to grow properly

items.question: What do we breathe?
hints: Think about what happens in a freezer
When water gets very cold, it freezes and becomes ice
